channel.title: Developer on Bluepie's update blog
channel.description: Recent content in Developer on Bluepie's update blog

item.title: Docker to Make Life Easier
item.description: Hello, it’s been two months since last update. Anyway the August month I was pretty busy, to be honest, I was involved in a old project of mine that I had to revist, in order to get more productive and flexibility in developing the application I chose to use docker. So this post is going to be about docker. Status Update:The month of August also had something interesting in it, which is my birthday.
